012package org.postgresql.pljava.example.annotation;
013
014import java.sql.SQLException;
015
016import org.postgresql.pljava.SessionManager;
017
018import org.postgresql.pljava.annotation.Function;
019import org.postgresql.pljava.annotation.SQLAction;
020
021/**
022 * Exercise new mappings between date/time types and java.time classes
023 * (JDBC 4.2 change 21).
024 *<p>
025 * Defines a method {@link #javaSpecificationGE javaSpecificationGE} that may be
026 * of use for other examples.
027 */
028@SQLAction(
029    requires="TypeRoundTripper.roundTrip",
030    install={
031    " SELECT" +
032    "  CASE WHEN every(orig = roundtripped)" +
033    "  THEN javatest.logmessage('INFO', 'java.time.LocalDate passes')" +
034    "  ELSE javatest.logmessage('WARNING', 'java.time.LocalDate fails')" +
035    "  END" +
036    " FROM" +
037    "  (VALUES" +
038    "   (date 'infinity')," +
039    "   (date '2017-08-21')," +
040    "   (date '1970-03-07')," +
041    "   (date '1919-05-29')," +
042    "   (date '-infinity')" +
043    "  ) AS p(orig)," +
044    "  javatest.roundtrip(p, 'java.time.LocalDate')" +
045    "  AS r(roundtripped date)",
046
047    " SELECT" +
048    "  CASE WHEN every(orig = roundtripped)" +
049    "  THEN javatest.logmessage('INFO', 'java.time.LocalTime passes')" +
050    "  ELSE javatest.logmessage('WARNING', 'java.time.LocalTime fails')" +
051    "  END" +
052    " FROM" +
053    "  (VALUES" +
054    "   (current_time::time)," +
055    "   ('00:00:00')," +
056    "   ('24:00:00')" +
057    "  ) AS p(orig)," +
058    "  javatest.roundtrip(p, 'java.time.LocalTime')" +
059    "  AS r(roundtripped time)",
060
061    " SELECT" +
062    "  CASE WHEN every(orig = roundtripped)" +
063    "  THEN javatest.logmessage('INFO', 'java.time.OffsetTime passes')" +
064    "  ELSE javatest.logmessage('WARNING', 'java.time.OffsetTime fails')" +
065    "  END" +
066    " FROM" +
067    "  (VALUES" +
068    "   (current_time::timetz)," +
069    "   ('00:00:00')," +
070    "   ('24:00:00')" +
071    "  ) AS p(orig)," +
072    "  javatest.roundtrip(p, 'java.time.OffsetTime')" +
073    "  AS r(roundtripped timetz)",
074
075    " SELECT" +
076    "  CASE WHEN every(orig = roundtripped)" +
077    "  THEN javatest.logmessage('INFO', 'java.time.LocalDateTime passes')" +
078    "  ELSE javatest.logmessage('WARNING','java.time.LocalDateTime fails')"+
079    "  END" +
080    " FROM" +
081    "  (SELECT 'on' = current_setting('integer_datetimes')) AS ck(idt)," +
082    "  LATERAL (" +
083    "   SELECT" +
084    "    value" +
085    "   FROM" +
086    "    (VALUES" +
087    "     (true, timestamp '2017-08-21 18:25:29.900005')," +
088    "     (true, timestamp '1970-03-07 17:37:49.300009')," +
089    "     (true, timestamp '1919-05-29 13:08:33.600001')," +
090    "     (idt,  timestamp  'infinity')," +
091    "     (idt,  timestamp '-infinity')" +
092    "    ) AS vs(cond, value)" +
093    "   WHERE cond" +
094    "  ) AS p(orig)," +
095    "  javatest.roundtrip(p, 'java.time.LocalDateTime')" +
096    "  AS r(roundtripped timestamp)",
097
098    " SELECT" +
099    "  CASE WHEN every(orig = roundtripped)" +
100    "  THEN javatest.logmessage('INFO', 'java.time.OffsetDateTime passes')"+
101    "  ELSE javatest.logmessage(" +
102    "         'WARNING','java.time.OffsetDateTime fails')"+
103    "  END" +
104    " FROM" +
105    "  (SELECT 'on' = current_setting('integer_datetimes')) AS ck(idt)," +
106    "  LATERAL (" +
107    "   SELECT" +
108    "    value" +
109    "   FROM" +
110    "    (VALUES" +
111    "     (true, timestamptz '2017-08-21 18:25:29.900005Z')," +
112    "     (true, timestamptz '1970-03-07 17:37:49.300009Z')," +
113    "     (true, timestamptz '1919-05-29 13:08:33.600001Z')," +
114    "     (idt,  timestamptz  'infinity')," +
115    "     (idt,  timestamptz '-infinity')" +
116    "    ) AS vs(cond, value)" +
117    "   WHERE cond" +
118    "  ) AS p(orig)," +
119    "  javatest.roundtrip(p, 'java.time.OffsetDateTime')" +
120    "  AS r(roundtripped timestamptz)",
121
122    " SELECT" +
123    "  CASE WHEN every(orig = roundtripped)" +
124    "  THEN javatest.logmessage('INFO', 'OffsetTime as stmt param passes')"+
125    "  ELSE javatest.logmessage(" +
126    "         'WARNING','java.time.OffsetTime as stmt param fails')"+
127    "  END" +
128    " FROM" +
129    "  (SELECT current_time::timetz) AS p(orig)," +
130    "  javatest.roundtrip(p, 'java.time.OffsetTime', true)" +
131    "  AS r(roundtripped timetz)"
132})
133public class JDBC42_21
134{
135    /**
136     * Return true if running under a Java specification version at least as
137     * recent as the argument ('1.6', '1.7', '1.8', '9', '10', '11', ...).
138     */
139    @Function(schema="javatest", provides="javaSpecificationGE")
140    public static boolean javaSpecificationGE(String want) throws SQLException
141    {
142        String got = SessionManager.current().frozenSystemProperties()
143            .getProperty("java.specification.version");
144        if ( want.startsWith("1.") )
145            want = want.substring(2);
146        if ( got.startsWith("1.") )
147            got = got.substring(2);
148        return 0 <= Integer.valueOf(got).compareTo(Integer.valueOf(want));
149    }
150}
